item.description:
Its time for the Sheep Shearing festival! Many people were interested, so I thought we'd give it a try. If you're wondering what a sheep shearing festival is, go to this web site: http://www.goreplace....

Besides watching the sheep get sheared, you can listen to traditional Scottish music, see kilts get made, watch traditional English dancing, and more. The is also a large food court and craft fair.

The festival runs from 10am to 5pm. We'll meet at 11am, stay for a while and then go somewhere afterwards if anyone is interested. Admission is $10 and parking is free!

The event is rain or shine. I will keep an eye on the weather a few days before and make sure the weather won't be too bad.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send out detail on where to meet closer to the day

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: 23rd annual Sheep Shearing festival
